[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/package-extractor](./package-extractor.md) &gt; [IExtractorOptions](./package-extractor.iextractoroptions.md) &gt; [linkCreationScriptPath](./package-extractor.iextractoroptions.linkcreationscriptpath.md)

## IExtractorOptions.linkCreationScriptPath property

The path to the generated link creation script. This is only used when [IExtractorOptions.linkCreation](./package-extractor.iextractoroptions.linkcreation.md) is 'script'.

**Signature:**

```typescript
linkCreationScriptPath?: string;
```
